mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(id, name, sex, phone, password, cultural_level) VALUE (#{Id},#{Name}, #{Sex}, #{Phone},#{Password},#{CulturalLevel})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET name = #{Name}, sex = #{Sex}, phone = #{Phone}, password = #{Password}, cultural_level = #{CulturalLevel} WHERE id = #{Id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, sex, phone, password, cultural_level FROM user
